item.title: Sentiment Analysis on Rick and Morty
item.description: Sentiment Analysis on Rick and Morty: After reading Text Mining with R, I was trying to think of a project I could apply what I had learned. It wasnâ€™t until I came across this blog post by Tamas Szilagyi: A TIDY TEXT ANALYSIS OF RICK ANDMORTY that my eyes were opened. As a huge Rick and Morty fan, the idea of combining text analysis and my favorite show was perfect.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
